notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: G.M. and S.B. contributed the study conception and design, analysis and interpretation of the data and drafting of the article; V.F. contributed in analysis and interpretation of the data and drafting the article; M.M., F.B., G.G., A.A.M. and S.Z. contributed in patients enrollment, S.O. and F.M. contributed in data analysis and experimental procedures; D.F.C. and P.B. contributed in analysis and interpretation of the data; all authors contributed to the critical revision of the manuscript for important intellectual content and gave approval of the final manuscript.
